channel.title: Need fast help
channel.description: need fast help, im new here tho ;D 1. how can i change starting point ? (easy i quess) 2. how can i get bank booth and things to somewhere other place ? (i tryed in umm .... objects.cfg but it didnt work, where do i hawe to enter it ) 3. how i change npc drops ? (tried in npcdrops.cfg dident work :| ) 4. how can i place npc,s? (i tried but i dont know why it didnt go ) well thats all 4 now ;D im just new in this. oo 1 more thing, how i can remove/make new teleports on emote tabs ???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 02:59:15 PM[/size][hr]some1 ? plz

item.title: Need fast help
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

  1. in client.java search for makeglobalobject.
  2. Change npc drops in npchandler.java (search for the monster)
  3. In autospawn.cfg
  4. Right click the emote, search for it in client.java. e.g if the emote tab id was “185” I’d search for case 185 in client.java. etc,
  5. To rename them, go to texthandler.java and search for the name.

Read full topic

item.title: Need fast help
item.dc:creator: @tehpkplace tehpkplace
item.description:
@tehpkplace wrote:

Change the starting point in player.java

Search for:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player

Adding a bank booth you will need a new global objects void or something like that, I forget… But with most servers you can right click a banker npc and choose bank banker.

Adding npcs is easy just go in autospawn.cfg and edit.

Read full topic
